name: Joshua Cattrell
text: They were very quick getting my pizza order ready. By the time i drove from 12 mile road to their shop my order was ready. I ordered the stuffed crust which i highly recommended. Very reasonably priced also!

name: Dory Goldberger
text: Ordered a large works and a medium pepperoni not sure which is which, since they are both the same size. I have a sneaky feeling I got two mediums.

name: Jessica Twomey
text: This location also sells beer, wine, and snacks which is super convenient

name: Todd Wieczorek
text: They do it right. Simple. We are fortunate to have HH in Troy.

name: Jeff Thompson
text: Good

name: Sondra Tackitt
text: Good pizza with reasonable prices. I never had a problem ordering from here and I always order online. Their location is really convenient since I live in the area. Their stuffed cheese bread is one of favorites.

name: Emily Lardner
text: Fast, good pizza. If you include a tip for a pick up order, they make it extra delicious and always remember to say thank you.

name: Ramona Kellner
text: Best! Try Kellners#1: The works Asiago stuffed crust extra mild peppers soon good üëç

name: John Kenned
text: Pizza was hot, fast, and made just right.

name: Carolynne Stupecki
text: New hours sunday to thursday 10am-11pm friday and saturday 11-12

name: J G
text: Not only was I given a few wings so tiny they were meatless I was shorted one in the end. Unfortunately gonna have to go elsewhere

name: Johnny Lazer
text: Great food! Appreciate the employees.

name: Maya Farah Ekkah
text: We had the worst experience ever with Howie's Troy, MI location today. This Howies is the worst. I ordered six large pizzas, two of them came wrong. I called them back regarding the wrong order, they insisted to take it back in order to ‚Ä¶More

name: Diana Stojkovic
text: This Howies is the best. They are always consistent with ingredient quality and customer service. Their pizzas are perfect, never too much or too little of anything. I've been going here for a decade, and I'm always extremely satisfied. Keep it up!

name: Laura Bush
text: Guys wear masks; open til 2am usually; sell beer & wine/ connected to party store

name: Dan Dau
text: I go to this location because they offer beer and pizza...

name: Ken Campbell
text: These people did a great job on our pizza. We came to Michigan from Iowa. Haven't had hungry Howie's since I was a kid in Florida. My pizza was fresh both times I ordered. These staff was very friendly. Thank you Michigan hungry Howie's!

name: Brittany Holland
text: Without a doubt the best hungry howies I've ever been too. Been going here since I was in elementary school, the owners son has always been super nice

name: Ray Wright
text: I just get carry-outs here. The service is fine and your food is ready at the time they promised. No complaints whatsoever with the food it is good and they prepare it with care.

name: Valter Barragan Neto
text: Great taste,  great variety and service was really nice and quick.  Pizza cooked on the right way. I will come back for sure

name: Jesse Varsalone
text: It's not the best pizza in the area but it's very cheap and hot and good. Also they support a lot of young kids in college that are working hard to make ends meet

name: Derek Mackie
text:
We always order online. They always get here quickly.

The food is good and the delivery people are always friendly. ‚Ä¶More

name: Dave V
text: Always fast! Always hot! Always friendly! Great store and great people.

name: Jamie Hawkins
text: This location has a very pleasant team and the liquor store is attached so you don't have to stop anywhere else.

name: Paige Cloutier
text: Don't  waste your money here. Drive the extra mile to another location. awful service, pizza was subpar. Forgot to mention a crust flavor and they didn't ask.

name: cheezmonkyz
text: This place is the best for late-night delivery. The online ordering is really convenient. I live about 3 miles away, and my food always gets here faster than the online system says, and its always hot. If you're looking for pizza at 1 in the morning, order here.

name: Rouge
text: I get delivery @ 2x a week. The food is ALWAYS HOT, FRESH, DELICIOUS, AND ON TIME. This is a great place to order from. The manager is very kind and have no problems with fixing anything. Don't think twice about ordering from here üòÜ‚úå.

name: Bradley Charboneau
text: Guy was nice food was great...took no time at all

name: Irfan Malik
text: It's good but not extra ordinary.

name: Roseanna Mendez
text: Foods always good after 8 months they are still very rude over the phone. They need to start training people how to speak properly and be polite

name: GhostDiZ
text: Best pizza I have ever had in my life. Still think about it even though I am on the other side of the country.

name: Mike Burnside
text:
They sell beer here!

That was the actual reason that I stopped in, but I've had enough Hungry Howie's ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan C.
text: Never seen a party store inside a Hungry Howies...

name: Ravi Singh
text: Veggie pizza with garlic crust was hot, fresh and nice. Hot and spicy Buffalo wings were good. They are open till midnight and in heart of Troy. Staff is friendly and smiling.

name: K Ho
text: One of the toppings were a little salty.  I think it is the burger meat or sussage one.  Other than that, pizza was OK.

name: Sanjeeva Reddy
text: reliable food and good care from service team

name: Brian B
text: Good local HH. Pizza is good and the flavor crust is great. Prices and deals are good. Staff is quiet but friendly and fast. If you want extra sauce make sure you remind them you want it under the cheese. Dip sauces are ok but not as good as papa johns.

name: John Rossiter
text: I didn't call ahead, so I was expecting a long wait for my pizza and wings. NOT the case. They group of pleasant young people took my order quickly, and I waited off to the side and picked out a nice bottle of wine (and a craft beer because ‚Ä¶More

name: Ayman Soliman
text:
Good pizza with reasonable prices.
I just bought a large two toppings pizza for $10, I recommend you all try that with thin crust and garlic herb flavor, it was great.

name: Jen Se
text: Great food. Nice delivery people. They will work with you if something is wrong and will read the delivery note so if you need them to call they do.

name: Kara Kellner
text: Ordered pizza the other day & they gave us extra topping for free! Not sure if they knew, but thank you! ‚Ä¶More

name: JL
text: Great Pizza üçï but their management and customer service is fantastic. Very polite, professional, and helpful.

name: Krishna Soundararajan
text: Not great Pizza but good enough to quickly feed a group of hungry teens

name: Jennifer Skwarek
text: Always got great service and great food, but tonight really ticked me off. Ordered a pizza almost an hour ago, guy said only a 40 min wait for delivery. Called to check on status and the order taken never got put in the system. Don't order from this location if you want to make sure you get your food, I'll never order here again.

name: GregnCarietta03 Herron
text: Great service, fresh as always. Great deals with coupons.

text: Manager who helped was very efficient, all of the staff super nice and provided a could pizza!

name: M M
text: Not good at alll!

text: Awesome pizza and with a free coupon my upgrade was a buck BOOYAO!!!!

name: Tony Dimaggio
text: Well made pizza

name: Derryl Givens
text: Hungry Howie's Pizza place was clean and the people were friendly. And the pizza was pretty good.

name: Amanda Cottee
text: I love hungry Howies I always have and I love the garlic butter crust yummy!

name: Ryan Sonshine
text: I've been ordering from this Howie's for years and have to say their pizza tastes even better than the other locations I've ordered from. It's also nice because this one is a party store too!

name: Brandon Pickens
text: Made an online order of a steak sub. An hour and a half later it shows up. Do yourself a favor dont order from here.

name: Marisa Anna
text: The guy/boy with the baby blue wedding band (lol) had terrible customer service. He was what seemed to be pissed off because my boyfriend called to change an order he had just placed online. When I came in to get the pizza he didn't make ‚Ä¶More

name: Flygirl Photography
text: We've always been very happy with the service and food at this hungry howies. I like that it is connected to a party store... so, if there's something else I need, I only need one stop.

name: Pete Sherman
text: Good food, fast delivery.   If you do a in store pick up the store is attached to a full service party store. So you can pick up a 6 pack while your at it!

name: Maurice Brown
text: Fast service good food

name: Derek vanatta
text: Good everytime we've gotten it

name: Christine Kluge

name: Michael Beals

name: darena matti
text: they were very unprofessional over the phone and hung up on my face. i do not recommend this type of service to an everyday customer :(

name: Myndi Goodman
text: Great service, friendly and helpful, besides Jets every once in a while, this Hungry Howie's will always be the place for my family and I!

text: The best howies, I drive 4 miles to grab from here! Liquor store inside.

name: Ryan Ortiz
text: The last few times I've ordered from here  the pizza has been awesome!

name: Nicholas Smith
text: Almost every time my family orders from this location we have an issue. on one occasion the pizza was not even cut..aside from the fact that it gets to my home COLD... Which I dont understand because I am 0.4 miles from the store.. Definitaly wont let anyone order this to my house ever again...
